description: Try our easy to follow Date & Pepita Muffins recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Date & Pepita Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a 12-hole muffin tin with paper cases.
Place date, butter, 1/2 cup of water, syrup, orange rind and 1/2 cup of orange juice in a small saucepan. Stir over medium heat until butter has melted. Remove from heat and cool for 5 minutes.

Combine flour, LSA and mixed spice in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and yoghurt together until smooth. Stir date mixture and yoghurt mixture into flour until just combined. Spoon into paper cases and sprinkle with pepitas. Cook for 20-25 minutes until golden.
